member.summary: Convenience class for building a text header with a first and a second level header. The corresponding data template is already implemented and will be automatically applied.

member.name: P:MaterialDesignExtensions.Model.StepTitleHeader.FirstLevelTitle
member.summary: The text of the first level title. A value of null will hide this title.

member.name: P:MaterialDesignExtensions.Model.StepTitleHeader.SecondLevelTitle
member.summary: The text of the second level title beneath the first level title. A value of null will hide the this title. It uses a smaller font size.
